channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-15521] setRightValue() code generated using FilterColumnBetween.txt is incorrect
item.description:
setRightValue() ends up setting the leftValue rather than rightValue:

  public void setRightValue(<OperandType> value) {
    this.leftValue = value;
  }
item.summary: setRightValue() code generated using FilterColumnBetween.txt is incorrect

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Tried a q-file test but this bug does not seem to affect query execution, but it would affect any callers of setRightValue(). Attaching patch with test that tests setRightValue()/getRightValue().

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12844837/HIVE-15521.1.patch
